titles.title: To impose a mandatory minimum sentence on a deportable alien who fails to depart or fails to attend a removal proceeding.
To impose a mandatory minimum sentence on a deportable alien who fails to depart or fails to attend a removal proceeding.

bill.summary: Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to provide that an alien who fails to appear at a removal proceeding shall be fined and imprisoned for not less than one year and not more than four years (or 10 years if deportable under smuggling, security, criminal, or document falsification grounds).
